meanings.definition: lymphangiographies: a diagnostic procedure used to visualize the lymphatic vessels
meanings.sent1: During the lymphangiographies, the doctor injected a dye to see the lymphatic vessels clearly.
meanings.sent2: The hospital performed several lymphangiographies to understand the patient's lymphatic system.
meanings.sent3: The lymphangiographies revealed a surprise twist when the dye turned the vessels a bright color.
meanings.sent4: Her lymphangiographies were like a treasure map, guiding the doctors through the intricate network of vessels.
meanings.sent5: The lymphangiographies painted a detailed picture of the hidden lymphatic pathways.
